p: Patients were divided into three transmission categories (TC; Table 1, Table S1). “Recipients” ( n = 36) were patients (secondary cases) for whom the source of their HIV had been clinically reported and confirmed. “Donors” ( n = 29) were patients (primary cases) confirmed to be the source of infection for Recipients. “Controls” ( n = 74) were patients with no known epidemiological connections, and served as control patients in the data.
